'@{concat(
   '[', 
   activity('Find or Create Sink Table').output.firstRow.sinkAzureSqlDatabaseTableSchemaName, 
   '].[', 
   activity('Find or Create Sink Table').output.firstRow.sinkAzureSqlDatabaseTableTableName, 
   ']'
)}'
